title: Friday Night Players: Big Fish
description: "I could feel my heart start to race. Was all this applause really for me? I felt a nudge from behind me and stepped forward. The audience began banging on their tables, and I heard a few cat calls from the side of the stage. The more I let the performance rush linger, the more I realized I wanted to do this as often as I could."It’s a typical Friday night for drag king “River Dancer,” who joined Friday Night Players to get closer to “Siren,” the troupe’s leading femme performer, but who had no idea how much a person could fall in love with the art of drag. When River learns that Siren is dating another member of FNP, however, she must decide where her loyalties lie: with the queen or with the kingdom.
author: Michelle DiCeglio
